translations: n.医院门诊病人（outpatient 的复数）

sentences.sentence: This phenomenon was observed in the outpatients.
sentences.translation: 在门诊病人中观察到这个现象。

sentences.sentence: A doctor once told me about one of his outpatients who suffered from the disease of eloquence.
sentences.translation: 一位医生向我介绍，他们在门诊中接触了一位雄辩症病人。医生说：“请坐。”

sentences.sentence: The subjects were psychiatric outpatients at the UCLA Aftercare Research Program in Los Angeles.
sentences.translation: 这些被试者在位于洛杉矶的UCLA的恢复期研究计划的精神科门诊接受治疗。
